actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a technology fellowship program for the improvement of graduate instruction in science, technology, and engineering, and for other purposes.
short_title: Science and Technology Fellowship Act of 1989

summary.text: Science and Technology Fellowship Act of 1989 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a technology fellowship program to assist State programs for higher education and industry partnerships to award graduate fellowships in science, engineering, and technology. Requires fellowship recipients to teach in public institutions of higher education for two years for each year of the fellowship, or else repay it. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990 through 1994.

titles.title: Science and Technology Fellowship Act of 1989

A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a technology fellowship program for the improvement of graduate instruction in science, technology, and engineering, and for other purposes.
